## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bd93a03dd511f9d7c410511963475b420e4509248f52573f9dbcb75147a43d8a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'matplotlib-req' @ 17.6.16 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
